attributes.action: Stop the Government campaign on fat people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One of the knock on effects from this constant "reduce weight" campaign by your government is that us shall we say "Not Overweight" people can no longer buy clothes that fit and are losing weight due to much needed calories being removed from food due to fat people.  This constant barrage of media aimed at lazy people is getting quite frankly annoying and what is worse is the fit all way it is being done by government and surprisingly the BMA.  The opinion at the moment is "If your not fat your healthy" which is of course absolute rubbish as my constantly reducing weight can testify to.
attributes.creator_name: Adam Christie-Grant - This will obviously be rejected

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
